Name: DREAM
About the game: 'An mysterious and tricky work, almost difficult to wrap your head around...' You can go at your own pace while exploring many areas of your dreams. Interacting with a particular object or character in the game gives you a item. These items can be used to change the look of the main character. Explore multiple different mesmerizing fantasy landscapes Interact with intriguing objects Complete short puzzles and mini-games Collect 16 different strange items that change the characters appearance Fight against some enemies with points and click style combat Unique music and art style Walk around using the arrow keys →←↑↓ and interact with objects with 'E'. You can open your inventory by pressing 'Esc'.
Meta Title: DREAM: Dec 23, 2021, Dedware and Full Overview
